duties_responsibilities.duty: Define and execute strategic verification and validation vision for Core Firmware engineering teams at Zoox.
Direct the activities of Core Firmware component verification and validation engineers, coordinating with firmware, software, release management, and vehicle engineering teams.
Develop industry-best testing methodologies for on-vehicle bootloaders, device drivers, networking stacks, and operating systems with a focus on safety-assurance and reliability.
Lead strategy, productivity, and impact of the verification and validation team within Firmware and Zoox as a whole.
Coach and enable career development of team members, review and refine firmware requirements, and manage the transition between component-level V&V and vehicle-level V&V.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Engineering or related field (Master's preferred)
